notes.summary: Change computations to run asynchronously (threaded).
Improve metadata in computed data items to include computation and source (acquisition) metadata.
Changed default stroke/fill options to non-filled for all layers when initially making composite line plots.
Composite line plots layers use component data item names unless label explicitly set in line plot inspector.
Add titles in browser view.
Improve context menu on line plots to be able to reveal line plot 'component' display items.
Improve performance of data and display panel list and grid browsers.
Fix issues with ring Fourier filter.
Fix another case where computations would be recomputed unnecessarily.
Improve internal handling of data item storage when size increases beyond 16MB.
Fix issues with line plot drawing at first and last pixel.
Fix issues with open dialogs preventing application closing.
Fix issues with window returning to same location when application last exited.
Fix issue where play-sequence would enter endless loop if adjusted while playing.
Fix issues with source/dependent thumbnails not showing consistently in display panels.
Fix issues with drag and drop files on display panel and data panel to import.
Fix issue with 'reveal' context menu item not working consistently.
Fix issue with metadata panel not showing data. Also add note when target data item has no metadata.
Change graphic highlighting when not focused to grey/dim.
Improve focus tracking so that inspector is active for either focused data panel item or focused display panel item.
Improve display panel header to truncate string when not enough room. Add mouse over highlighting.
Add a line profile computation automatically when copying and pasting a line profile from one image to another.
Add option when dragging lines to keep center fixed using alt/option key.
Fix issue where raster display tries to access deleted data.
Improve speed of data panel drawing and filtering.
Add support for exporting to HDF5-based 'nhdf' file format.
Change Export SVG dialog to remember units.
Fix crashes when switching workspaces.
Fix issue with graphic interval on picks not updating slice interval correctly.
Fix issue with undo after adding graphics.
Fix issue with graphic coordinates on 2d collection of 2d data.
Fix issue with info panel not displaying sequence of 2d collection of 2d data pixels correctly.
Fix keyboard focus issue in Session panel.
Use filename when title is empty or missing on import (was only when missing).
Add storage space to size info in data panel. Additionally, add file type in display item tool tips.
Add zoom tool in toolbar. Also add zoom shortcut 'z'.
Display performance improvements and other drawing improvements.
Display snapshot now includes display range, color table, etc.
Export and copy to SVG uses sans-serif fonts now.
Allow export to SVG to specify size in pixels, inches, or centimeters.
Keep sizing of surrounding display panels when removing one.
Retain state of inspector section twist downs when switching contexts or restarting.
Fix issues with display layers and graphics becoming disconnected in inspector after insert/delete/move.
Fix issue with custom data group not retaining data items added to it.
Fix issue when clicking on graphic center in inspector.
Add export result dialog to show final export status after exporting.
Export single data items with same naming options as exporting multiple items.
Sanitize file names during export to eliminate illegal characters,
Exporting to CSV only allows 1D or 2D data.
Improve handling of color table files and allow packages to register custom color tables.
Fix issue of swapped color channels when exporting to PNG, JPEG, GIF, and BMP.
Allow user to assign/unassign rectangle used for cropping computation data source inputs using icon overlay.
Runs with Python 3.13 and Numpy 2.x. Drop Python 3.9 and 3.10 support.
Computed data items titles update automatically when changing source title.
Improve drawing performance and fix minor inconsistencies.
Improve startup performance by fixing issue that invalidated thumbnails on exit.
Fix issue where exporting could overwrite files with same metadata.
Add mechanism to include additional display calibrations (e.g., e/eV/s).
Improve handling of number precision for inspector calibrations and display limits.
Ask user for SVG size before exporting (assumes 96 DPI).
Improve ordering of fields in session dialogs to have most frequently used fields at top.
Fix issue when displaying line plot of integer-valued 1D data item using log scale.
Importing valid data always succeeds by assign new identifiers, instead of silently skipping possible duplicates.
Sort recent workspaces in menu by creation date (if available). Older workspaces copy modified date to creation date.
Add support for independent dimensional and intensity calibrations.
Add menu items for flip horizontal/vertical and rotate right/left.
Fix issue when removing workspace to select next most recent workspace.
Fix issue when splitting display panels with multiple panels selected.
Make filtering work on modified date text and session metadata text when filtering data items in data panel.
Fix issue with data panel spontaneously switching display after processing when using data panel text filter.
Fix issues with line plot when dimensional calibrations are invalid. Fall back to pixel calibration.
Fix crash when screen properties change. Also respond better to DPI changes.
Add scroll bar to activity panel to prevent it growing beyond its available height.
Hovering over items in grid browser shows info about the item.
Hovering over title bar shows info about the displayed item.
Add a Radial Power Spectrum menu item to Fourier processing sub-menu.
Add a radial profile menu item to Fourier processing sub-menu.
Expand About Box to include release notes and recent changes.
Performance improvements to avoid metadata copying.
Commands work after deleting multiple display items.
Fall back to uncalibrated coordinates for angle/length if units don't match on datum dimensions.
Data panel dragging works on first click now.
Add the option to display the phase of a complex array.
Mapped/unmapped processing (when available) now works in unmapped case.
Fix several cases where index sliders were incorrect.
Minor performance improvement when loading projects.
Minor fixes for Python 3.12 and mypy typing compatibility.
Add mechanism for packages to run startup code for Console windows.
Improve shutdown of Console to garbage collect local variables declared in console.
